title: Shard splitting should support collections configured with a hash router and routeField.
description:
Follow up with work done in SOLR-5017:

Shard splitting doesn't support collections configured with a hash router and routeField.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content:
Updated to use router.field instead of routeField property.

This is ready to be committed.
